Text: He is risen‚Äîthe Son of God lives! May the promise of Jesus Christ‚Äôs Resurrection bring hope to all of those experiencing hard times. Wishing you and your loved ones a blessed Easter.

The brave men and women of our U.S. Capitol Police work tirelessly to keep the Capitol and the lives of those inside of it safe. Grateful for the USCP officers and other first responders who are on the scene. Praying for the two officers that have been injured in today‚Äôs attack.

Members of the @UTNationalGuard have consistently answered the call of duty‚Äîespecially these past months. I met with Major General Michael Turley and other leaders of the Utah National Guard in Draper to discuss recent efforts to assist Utahns in getting their #COVID19 vaccines. https://t.co/VQeKizxtbA

Utahns are unable to fully utilize the Bonneville Shoreline Trail for recreational opportunities due to several wilderness-designated areas along the trail. My bill with @RepJohnCurtis would adjust the boundaries to ensure Utahns can fully enjoy the trail. https://t.co/3RQJQnecUi

The Chinese Communist Party is committing grave human rights abuses and flouting the rules of global trade in its quest to make China the world‚Äôs military, geopolitical, and economic superpower. Tune in as I discuss our increasing China threat with @USGLC: https://t.co/j9kDjANS65

Glad to hear this was caught relatively early and that you‚Äôre expected to make a full recovery, Thom. Ann and I wish you the best of luck as you undergo treatment‚Äîwe are keeping you in our prayers. https://t.co/hjkyUYENRi

Burma‚Äôs military leaders have killed 260 people and detained 2,200 since last month's coup. The U.S. must lead an international effort to expand the sanctions, and call upon China to join this effort or suffer the public exposure of callous disregard for the plight of humanity. https://t.co/r13gdsLieQ

The cost of keeping our kids out of school is so unbelievably high‚Äîacademically and socially‚Äîthat it‚Äôs inconceivable schools remain closed when data doesn‚Äôt suggest increase risk of #COVID19. We must get our kids back in school. https://t.co/8AbFlohLwT

Science, not teachers unions, should dictate the re-opening of our schools. And the data is in‚Äîk-12 schools are not super-spreaders. Schools that can re-open safely should do so. Period. https://t.co/ri0TMI6d5M

My Family Security Act would create a new national commitment to American families by modernizing our outdated federal policies into a monthly cash benefit. Live from the @SutherlandInst with @DouthatNYT: https://t.co/X9thKYUs50

Live soon‚Üí I‚Äôm joining the @SutherlandInst and @DouthatNYT to discuss the Family Security Act‚Äîmy legislation to help families meet the challenges they face raising our society‚Äôs children. Tune in: https://t.co/q5nmqUcNLg

The Chinese Communist Party is exacting genocide against the Uyghurs and other ethnic minorities in the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region. We condemn the CCP‚Äôs treatment of the Uyghurs and call for an international investigation into these crimes & abuses. https://t.co/MNCKcghteg

This is the right move. The Chinese Communist Party has been committing genocide to destroy Uyghur people. Teaming up with our allies is the only way to get the CCP to alter their behavior. https://t.co/bXWUtY7dce

The Chinese Communist Party is engaging in hostage diplomacy‚Äîplain and simple. The sham trials of Michael Kovrig and Michael Spavor‚Äîall behind closed doors‚Äîshould outrage the world. We stand in solidarity with these men and our Canadian allies. https://t.co/dcm5ge1FSe

Here‚Äôs to hoping Utah‚Äôs four teams‚Äî@BYUBasketball, @BYUwbb, @USUBasketball, and @UVUwbb‚Äîgo far in the @NCAA tournament. But at the end of the day, it‚Äôs #GoCougs all the way üèÄ https://t.co/w4mS4FY88W
Utahns‚Üí @USTreasury and the IRS have extended the 2020 federal income tax filing due date to May 17, 2021. https://t.co/SNwypjrSKZ

Live now: I'm joining @AmerCompass to discuss my Family Security Act‚Äîlegislation that creates a new national commitment to American families by modernizing our outdated federal policies into a monthly cash benefit: https://t.co/84XqF0yVU6

Encouraged that the review deadline for Bears Ears & Grand Staircase-Escalante has been extended so that @SecDebHaaland can visit before any decisions are made. We must have a permanent legislative solution‚Äîwith input from Utah's stakeholders‚Äîthat resolves these boundaries. https://t.co/BAJU72nu3f
What's happening at our southern border is a real crisis, and the Administration is making it worse by unlawfully freezing border wall funding appropriated by Congress. https://t.co/MmZJKKTGmb

China is out-competing us because the U.S. lacks a comprehensive China strategy. The CCP is using every tool in its toolkit to ensure China becomes the world‚Äôs geopolitical, military, and economic superpower. We must develop a comprehensive, proactive strategy with our allies. https://t.co/vjGeM8QWTH

The Administration's 30x30 initiative to put restrictions on 30% of U.S. lands and waters by 2030 displays a thoughtlessness and leaves many of our questions unanswered. Utah stakeholders must be brought to the table on critical lands and water decisions. https://t.co/ZsFLBebiuy

However, based on Rep. Haaland's record and views on land management and energy resources, including her support for radical policies like the Green New Deal, I am not able to support her confirmation to lead @Interior. https://t.co/vZ3rngRgKk

When I met with Rep. Haaland, we discussed several issues of importance to Utah‚Äîthe recent temporary suspension of federal energy leases, the ongoing review of our national monuments, and concerns regarding the Administration‚Äôs intent to assert greater control over public lands. https://t.co/rYty0KPc0J

Limiting spectators, selectively shaping our respective delegations, and refraining from broadcasting Chinese propaganda would prevent China from reaping many of the rewards it expects from the Olympics.

Reduce China‚Äôs revenues, shut down their propaganda, and expose their abuses. An economic and diplomatic boycott of the Beijing Olympics‚Äîwhile letting athletes compete‚Äîis the right answer. https://t.co/JELBoARpf3

Unilateral executive action creates much uncertainty surrounding the boundaries and access of our monuments. The Administration must engage state, local, and tribal leaders to develop a solution to these longstanding issues that has widespread support. https://t.co/vF9CPd8CZa

Today, @SenMikeLee, @RepChrisStewart, @RepJohnCurtis, @RepBurgessOwens, @RepBlakeMoore, and I met with @Interior officials to discuss the need for a permanent legislative solution to resolve the boundaries for Utah's Bears Ears and Grand Staircase-Escalante national monuments.
Congrats, @TomHolmoe! #GoCougs https://t.co/Y6ABSVY8y5

Democracy is essential to the prosperity and well-being of people around the world. Yet, we're seeing the global retreat of freedom. We must focus on our soft power and link arms with like-minded nations to promote democracy, countering the malevolent efforts of Russia and China. https://t.co/9HqIL07wbd

Not at all surprised to see Utah top the list for best economy in the U.S. State leaders have worked diligently, especially during the COVID-19 pandemic, to ensure that Utah is a great place to do business‚Äîcreating more jobs for Utahns and driving economic growth. https://t.co/MXaVCv5wNh

The Administration must also extend the 60-day review period timeline in order to allow the @Interior Secretary time to travel to Utah and tour these monuments. These decisions shouldn‚Äôt be made unilaterally and without input from local stakeholders. https://t.co/TrklstSKgw

National monuments, like Utah‚Äôs Bears Ears and Grand Staircase-Escalante, have become a political football between administrations. We urge the Biden Administration to end this back-and-forth with a legislative solution to determine appropriate boundaries for these monuments.

Revisions made to Hong Kong‚Äôs electoral system continue to advance the CCP‚Äôs ever-tightening grip on Hong Kongers‚Äô autonomy, freedoms & fundamental human rights. The Administration must use available tools and work with allies to support the people of HK. https://t.co/8oeo8VgDen
It‚Äôs disappointing that the Administration and Democrats chose to push through a partisan plan that borrows money for states that don‚Äôt need it and adds to the national debt.

I voted against the $1.9 trillion #COVID19 package because it‚Äôs full of wasteful spending unrelated to urgent pandemic needs. Republicans, in good faith, sought to negotiate a compromise bill that would have targeted COVID assistance to those who really need it.

Twenty-one states are seeing a rise in revenue. California had a record surplus last year. And yet under this $1.9 trillion #COVID19 bill, we‚Äôre going to send billions of dollars‚Äîborrowed from China‚Äîto states that don't need more money! That doesn‚Äôt make any sense at all. https://t.co/72rQ7hgzBd

This $1.9 trillion #COVID19 plan is full of wasteful spending on items un-related to urgent pandemic needs. My amendments would help promote the safe and immediate reopening of schools and ensure that only states in financial need would get funding. https://t.co/tta6LPqdf2

What‚Äôs proposed in the Administration‚Äôs $1.9 trillion #COVID19 plan is not at all aligned with the reality of our states‚Äô outcomes. If states are feeling pain, we should help them. But we should not borrow money from the Chinese to help states that are doing well financially. https://t.co/4w6rhUzVWi

Doubling the current federal minimum wage to $15 would destroy 1.4 million jobs‚Äîharming workers and employers who are already struggling due to #COVID19. Our proposal would raise wages for nearly 3.5 million workers without costing jobs. Learn more: https://t.co/fw8IUlsEo0

The amount of excess in the Administration‚Äôs $1.9 trillion #COVID19 plan is outrageous. States that are doing well financially will get billions of dollars. California had a record surplus last year, but would still get $27 billion. It just doesn‚Äôt make any sense. https://t.co/X2sFQ9yzwn

Grateful that Utah Representative Jon Hawkins has started to recover from COVID-19. We‚Äôre continuing to keep you and your family in our prayers. Now get better so you can be back on the Hill‚Äîyou are sorely missed! https://t.co/hjNYEui9i2

We have a great task ahead of us in addressing the threat China poses to the free world. As the lead Republican on @SenateForeign's China subcommittee, I look forward to working with colleagues to develop an effective strategy to counter China's predation. https://t.co/jcYdpgrh0d

Our federal trusts funds are in grave trouble. I urge the Administration to come to the table to find bipartisan compromise on solutions that help rescue these funds from impending insolvency‚Äîafter all, 71 senators supported the bipartisan #TRUSTact a few weeks ago. https://t.co/IQbjjnVz5S

The Administration‚Äôs $1.9 trillion #COVID19 plan adds to our national debt without creating benefit to our economy or helping people in need. This isn‚Äôt monopoly money‚Äîthese are real dollars that will be paid for by our children and grandchildren. https://t.co/XyMFnZztwK

Iran is ramping up already consistent aggressive behavior to target US assets & regional partners. The US must prevent Iran from ever having a nuclear weapon capable of reaching intended targets. It‚Äôs paramount that we continue applying maximum pressure on the Iranian government. https://t.co/CVAkq10Kmf

The Ground Based Strategic Deterrent program at Utah‚Äôs @HAFB is critical to our national security. Pleased @USAirForce is prioritizing the modernization of our nuclear deterrent since our adversaries continue to pursue their nuclear ambitions. Thanks for visiting, @GenCQBrownJr. https://t.co/xNye98u2Fm

The U.S. must have two goals when it comes to Iran:

1) Dissuade Iran from ever developing a nuclear weapon
2) Assure that Iran‚Äîand any other nation even thinking about going nuclear‚Äîknows that the price they will pay for developing a nuclear weapon will be intolerably high https://t.co/qo9sn0Y4pF

Our growing national debt‚Äîsped up by #COVID19‚Äîis a national crisis. The Administration now wants to add a $1.9 trillion relief package, much of which is not for urgent pandemic-related needs. We have got to get our fiscal house in order before it‚Äôs too late. https://t.co/2mKs3SKVUB

New sanctions against those accountable for the poisoning & imprisonment of Navalny send a strong message that the US won't tolerate the Putin regime‚Äôs lawlessness. Applaud the administration's actions to hold bad actors in Russia responsible for malign efforts to crush dissent. https://t.co/vNRUkrfpX2

My top priority in Congress is to advocate for Utahns. @SenMikeLee and I combined our constituent services operations‚Äîa first in the Senate‚Äîto more efficiently and effectively serve the citizens of our state. We were honored to help out this family during this heartbreaking time. https://t.co/VvcWpB8Gvh

The CCP relies on theft to advance its ambitions of becoming the global superpower. Our universities are prime targets given their research and technology development. We‚Äôre pushing for transparency at our universities to counter these threats to our national security. https://t.co/L3iK9nB6GM

Raising the minimum wage is long-overdue. But, a $15 minimum wage would destroy 1.4 million jobs. Our proposal would raise wages for nearly 3.5 million workers, without costing jobs, and ensure employers only hire legal workers. https://t.co/1XBd8nDz8I

All freedom and autonomy for the people of Hong Kong has vanished. We must not ignore the Chinese Communist Party‚Äôs campaign of brutal repression and censorship of independent thought. The U.S. must work with our allies to confront the CCP‚Äôs growing aggression. https://t.co/FcxrceX4Cq

For the past 6 years, @USAttyHuber has dedicated himself to the betterment of our state, upholding the rule of law and serving Utahns. We are grateful for his nearly 3 decades of public service on behalf of our nation and wish him all the best in his next endeavor. https://t.co/xPpRiMCUhd

The Secure Rural Schools program is an essential funding source for schools in Utah‚Äôs rural communities, which have been hit especially hard by health and economic impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic. Congress must reauthorize the SRS program. https://t.co/xOSu5fVSwW

Glad @ProvoPolice Officer John Oseguera is in stable condition. Our law enforcement officers put their lives on the line every day to protect our communities. Praying for Officer Oseguera‚Äôs continued recovery and the safety of his fellow officers. https://t.co/ayCxvQoWCn

The Administration‚Äôs #COVID19 proposal calls for $170 billion for education, yet has no realistic plan to reopen K-12 schools. Only 4% of that funding would be spent this year! We‚Äôve got to get schools open‚Äîwe can‚Äôt let unreasonable demands by teachers unions keep schools closed. https://t.co/mZ1M0oZqHB

Our kids are getting addicted to nicotine through flavored vaping products‚Äînearly 1/4 of high schoolers are vaping on regularly. We‚Äôve got to get flavored vaping products off of the market and implement a robust public education campaign to warn kids about the dangers of vaping. https://t.co/thuWJA7Pjn

Pleased to have @SenatorCollins, @SenCapito, and @SenRobPortman join me and @SenTomCotton on the Higher Wages for American Workers Act‚Äîa  proposal to raise wages for nearly 3.5 million workers, without costing jobs, and require employers to use E-Verify. https://t.co/fw8IUlsEo0

The timetable for opening schools should be dictated by science, not teachers unions. Data does not indicate #COVID19 spikes in schools that are open. Schools that can safely reopen should do so. https://t.co/KWMO7lMHQP
Senate Republicans have shown we‚Äôre willing to compromise in order to provide need-based #COVID19 relief to the American people. The Administration should come to the table. https://t.co/LGzuQGJCqt

More than 1/3 of funding in the Administration's proposed #COVID19 package wouldn‚Äôt be spent until 2022 or later, undermining their claim that the massive price tag is justified for urgent pandemic-related needs. The next relief package should be targeted and bipartisan. https://t.co/3GNfIhTonV

These are difficult times for many and it‚Äôs time to increase the federal minimum wage. But a $15 minimum wage would destroy 1.4 million jobs. Instead, our proposal would gradually raise wages for 3.5 million workers without harming the very workers it‚Äôs intended to protect. https://t.co/VHctDNbbcH

Confucius Institutes are a propaganda tool of the Chinese Communist Party. We urge the President to implement the proposed rule requiring U.S. academic institutions to disclose their relationships with Confucius Institutes. We must protect our students. https://t.co/haP98Zx5VV

The creation of a true health care marketplace is critical to keeping the costs of health care in check. We must work toward transparency in costs of procedures and outcomes‚Äîespecially for elective procedures‚Äîthat empower patients in making decisions regarding their health care. https://t.co/tAQAyGFYXl

Our federal trust funds‚Äîprograms like Medicare‚Äîare facing impending insolvency. This alone makes #MedicareForAll a non-starter. We can‚Äôt expand something already on track to go bankrupt. Our bipartisan #TRUSTact works to shore up programs like Medicare before they collapse. https://t.co/ZvDktlEnUl

Congress hasn't increased the federal minimum wage in more than a decade. It's time we protect American workers. Our bill‚Äîthe Higher Wages for American Workers Act‚Äîincreases the minimum wage to $10 while ensuring businesses cannot hire illegal workers. https://t.co/5pO5DZCyLw

We can create opportunities for American workers and protect their jobs, while also eliminating one of the key drivers of illegal immigration. My bill with @SenTomCotton would gradually raise the minimum wage to $10 while mandating employers use E-Verify. https://t.co/5pO5DZCyLw

A devastating figure. Behind these statistics are lives cut short‚Äîlike my dear friend Bob Garff. We've all been affected by the loss of a friend, neighbor or loved one.

We must work to accelerate vaccine delivery & continue following health protocols to protect our communities. https://t.co/zufW8zGPPW
Also, congratulations to Logan and St. George‚Äîwho came in at #2 and #4, respectively, on the list of best-performing small cities. This is great news for Utah!

Utah has 3 cities on @MilkenInstitute's #BestPerformingCities Index‚Äîthe only state to have multiple cities in the top 10! Cities like Provo-Orem, Salt Lake City, and Ogden-Clearfield continue to make the Beehive State one of the best economies and places to live in the country. https://t.co/oc3aFGV6PU
The data is in: schools are not superspreaders. Science, not the teachers unions, should guide the timetable for opening. Schools that can safely reopen should do so.

Utahns‚ÄîI encourage you to sign up for our state‚Äôs #COVID19 newsletter to receive important updates on vaccine distribution and other COVID-19 information: https://t.co/yx6drlsu35. Getting Americans vaccinated is an important step toward protecting ourselves and our communities.

Confucius Institutes‚ÄîCCP-backed programs that spread propaganda to our youth‚Äîthreaten our national security. I urge the Administration to require that schools disclose ties to the CCP and take a hard look at whether these Institutes should even be allowed to operate in the U.S.

Congress hasn‚Äôt raised the minimum wage in more than a decade, leaving many Americans behind. Our proposal gradually raises the minimum wage without costing jobs, setting it to increase automatically with inflation, and requires employers to verify the legal status of workers.

Millions of Americans are struggling to make ends meet. I‚Äôm introducing a bill with @SenTomCotton that would increase the minimum wage while ensuring businesses cannot hire illegal immigrants. We must protect American workers.
My statement on today‚Äôs impeachment vote: https://t.co/EzWS0n0Rja

The heroic actions of U.S. Capitol Police officers and agents saved the lives of all of us inside the Capitol on January 6. My family and I are especially grateful that Officer Eugene Goodman directed me to safety that day. This is an honor befitting his tremendous bravery. https://t.co/PiElwuCU1i
The questions I‚Äôve submitted for the question and answer period of the impeachment trial‚Üí https://t.co/mgm6katR9u

The U.S. needs a comprehensive strategy to counter the increasing threat posed by China.

Pleased the President is tasking @DeptofDefense to take steps toward addressing this threat and I hope this is an area in which we can find bipartisan cooperation. https://t.co/YITNprSjCE

The Family Security Act would provide greater financial certainty for American families by modernizing antiquated federal polices into a monthly cash benefit, without adding a dime to the deficit. Here‚Äôs what conservative leaders and writers are saying: https://t.co/wLhYgw4GNI

Raising children is some of the most important work we will ever do. My proposal would provide greater security for America‚Äôs families by consolidating the many complicated federal programs into a monthly cash benefit, without adding to the deficit. https://t.co/cG5hwPTG94

Last night‚Äôs #TRUSTact vote indicates there is broad, bipartisan recognition of the need to address the insolvency of our federal trust funds‚Äîworsened by #COVID19. If we don‚Äôt tackle this problem now, it may hurt our ability to combat future emergencies. https://t.co/f6cEFWd6tI

It‚Äôs reckless to ignore the impending insolvency of our federal trust funds. #COVID19 has accelerated our fiscal problems‚Äîrequiring us to borrow trillions of dollars to get through the pandemic. Pleased our bipartisan #TRUSTact amendment passed 71-29 last night. https://t.co/JKFfvfkeS4

Confucius Institutes are merely a tool for the Chinese Communist Party to spread propaganda to our youth and they have no place in Utah schools or our country. Applaud efforts in the Utah Legislature to remove these institutes from our state universities. https://t.co/wfGdsZKrDa

I've offered amendments to the budget resolution that help Utah and our country confront the challenges we face, including providing financial security for families, supporting energy leasing on federal lands, and bolstering national security. Learn more: https://t.co/FYU3hy4P4B

Our changing economy, and antiquated federal family support system, has left millions of families behind. The Family Security Act creates a new national commitment to American families by modernizing outdated federal policies into a monthly cash benefit. https://t.co/cG5hwPTG94

Families are facing greater financial strain and marriage and birth rates are at an all-time low. Now is the time to help families meet the challenges they face as they take on most important work any of us will ever do‚Äîraising our society‚Äôs children. https://t.co/cG5hwPC4Ku

Alexei Navalny has been sentenced to years in prison after Putin and his cronies set up a sham trial. We must hold them accountable for these acts, which are a shameless attempt to silence the voice of the Russian people fighting against corruption. https://t.co/zD0DCrGuw8

Officer Brian Sicknick gave his life protecting the U.S. Capitol and the lives of those of us inside of it. But most importantly, he gave his life protecting our democracy. He is a hero‚Äîour Capitol Police officers are heroes. Rest in peace‚Äîwe will never forget your sacrifice. https://t.co/ofEDgl6cMk

Navajo Nation has some of the highest #COVID19 infection rates in the country‚Äîdue largely to a lack of infrastructure. Our bill addresses this issue by authorizing the construction & renovation of water & sewer sanitation facilities in Native communities. https://t.co/usTMQy4TUH

Strong leaders don‚Äôt have to jail adversaries to maintain power. First, Alexei Navalny was poisoned, and when unsuccessful, the Putin regime has now jailed him following a sham of a trial. We'll be introducing legislation this week to sanction those responsible for these acts. https://t.co/nmDhn3b9OL

We had a productive meeting with @POTUS and @VP to discuss our #COVID19 proposal. We will continue talking to try to find areas of common ground. The first five relief packages were done on a bipartisan basis, and this one should follow suit.

My colleagues and I look forward to meeting with the President at the White House this afternoon to discuss the details of our #COVID19 relief proposal‚Äîa package capable of garnering bipartisan support. https://t.co/0T6SBbFxFH

We have proposed a #COVID19 relief package that's capable of garnering bipartisan support and request a meeting with the President to discuss our proposal in detail. It's imperative that we work together to meet the needs of Americans during this pandemic. https://t.co/9X09sTxHFt

The lives of our children, both born and unborn, deserve our protection. I remain committed to protecting the innocent and defending the dignity of life. While #MarchForLife may be virtual this year, I stand with those who ‚Äúmarch‚Äù in defense of society's most vulnerable. https://t.co/yiy913bFeF

Long-term decisions on energy leases should be approved by Congress, not by executive order. Suspending oil & gas leasing on federal lands will be devastating to Utah‚Äôs rural communities, tribes and small businesses & be detrimental to our energy industry. https://t.co/p9L1eaHpxV

Part of China‚Äôs strategy is to invest in countries‚Äîand in regions like Africa‚Äînot for economic benefit, but for increased geopolitical control. The U.S. must proactively invest in these countries so they don't have to make the difficult decision to partner with the Chinese. https://t.co/sUolOarn1e

I am grateful Rob will still be with us in the Senate for two more years and I look forward to our continued work together on the Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs Committee. Ann and I offer our best to him, his wife Jane, and their entire family. https://t.co/nfKbYicv9J

Over his three decades in public service, my friend @RobPortman has been a dedicated and principled leader for Ohio and our nation. His policy contributions on a range of issues, particularly related to budget and trade, have had a positive impact. We will miss him greatly.
